name: Dr.Caroline Mary A
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Information Technology )  - PSG College of Technology   - 2010M.Sc  ( Computer Technology )  - PSG College of Technology   - 2012Ph.D  ( Computer Science )  - Hindusthan College of Arts and Science Supervisor: Dr A V Senthil Kumar
in_brief: Dr. A. Caroline Mary is an Assistant professor working in Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences. She has completed B.Sc. in IT and M.Sc. in CT from PSG College of Technology and completed PhD in the area of Networks. She has cleared the NET and SET exams.

publications.title: A Novel Underwater Packet Scheduling based on Modified Priority Backpressure and Peak Age of Information approach
